loan.name: Esther Marisol
loan.use: to equip an apiary with all the necessities and to build a fence for protection from animals and people.
loan.description:
Esther is 20 years old. She lives in Chuquisaca in Monteagudo with her parents. The new business she will start will be honey production and sales. This will generate income to cover her food expenses, among others. She has training from the Pasos foundation. Esther does not have a husband or children depending on her.

With her financing she will equip an apiary with all the necessities and also build a fence for protection from animals and people. She will have a new job and business that will help her to generate good income and thus have a better standard of living. She will also be able to compete in the local market because it is necessary now.
loan.whySpecial: It offers entrepreneurs loans with grace periods to set up new businesses.
